Reduction

Method Detail

run

public OptInfo run(DepotLinkedList mainDepots)
Checks to see whether all of the customers on any given route can be assigned to other routes, and if possible, then remove that route, therefore reducing the number of routes. Author: Dilsara Pathirana

Overrides:
run in class MixedFleetOptimization
Returns:
a boolean value stating whether any routes were removed (true) or not (false)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

AttemptToRemoveRoute

public boolean AttemptToRemoveRoute(DepotLinkedList mainDepots,
                                    java.util.Vector shipmentVector,
                                    Truck currentTruck)
This method is used by the Reduction module to attempt to assign stops from currentTruck into other routes, if possible. In order to completely remove a route, all stops in that route must be assigned to other routes. If all stops from the current route cannot be assigned to other routes, then the attempt will fail and method will return false. Author: Dilsara Pathirana

Parameters:
shipmentVector - A vector containing the shipments in current route that needs to be assigned to other routes.
currentTruck - A references to the currentTruck.
Returns:
A boolean value stating whether the attempt succeeded (true) or not (false).

setSwapConfirm

public void setSwapConfirm(SwapConfirm c)
Sets the confirmation function for the swaps. This function will determine if the swaps are executed based upon the cost difference.

Parameters:
c - swap confirmation class
